title: 服务器崩溃，求大神解决
txt_content:
服务器打开就崩溃 版本1.6.4 纯净服
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't do that.

Time: 14-2-14 下午5:59
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.net.UnknownHostException: 192.168.1.319
        at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
        at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source)

        at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source)

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R3.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:393)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R3.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:583)

CraftRecipe, CraftShapedRecipe, ...], [org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R3.potion.CraftPotionEffectType], [org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R3.util.ServerShutdownThread, Waitable, TerminalConsoleHandler, ...], replies.txt_content: 你1.6几的？貌似服务端核心版本低...

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content: 服务端损坏了，丢失了文件。重新安装就好

Lucky777777 发表于 2014-2-14 19:22
服务端损坏了，丢失了文件。重新安装就好
我用任何服务器都是这样，重下重开了无数次
